title: Kids Is a 4-Letter Word
description: From beloved author Stephanie Bond comes a fan-favorite romantic comedy about finding love in the very last place you'd think to look.Smart, savvy career woman Jo Montgomery has nothing against kids—she just doesn't want any herself. So when she finds herself stuck taking three little darlings to the most important meeting of her career, she panics and prepares for the worst.The last thing she expected was to get the job—because of the children.Then she meets the children's father, gorgeous widower John Sterling, and Jo realizes her troubles have just begun. Because John is the man Jo has been looking for all her life. But no matter how sexy, how absolutely irresistible the children's father is, Jo still firmly believes that KIDS is a four-letter word.
author: Stephanie Bond
